animeTitle: Digimon Savers: Agumon! Gaomon! Lalamon! Bakuretsu! Jougai Last Battle!
otherNames: Digimon Savers Special: Agumon! Gaomon! Lalamon! Explosion! The Last Battle Off-screen, デジモンセイバーズ 特典映像 アグモン！ガオモン！ララモン！爆裂！場外ラストバトル！
synopsis: A recap of the whole Digimon Savers TV series in one episode, with original commentary by Agumon, Gaomon, and Lalamon, included in the final volume of the DVD releases.
